EmailTemplate.description: Email to partner notifying them they have a new lead
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Comms - You have a new lead
EmailTemplate.subject: You have a new Community Solar lead!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have a new Community Solar lead!
One of our customers has referred a friend to BlueWave Community Solar.
Please check your BlueWave portal to follow up with this new lead and assist with the sign up process.
We look forward to growing the BlueWave Solar Community! - Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
